item.title: Owner Attacking Anywhere (Out Of Wildy) Help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Anywhere in my client.java where it has said if (!nonWild) { I have made it if (!nonWild || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“God”)) {, meaning if your not in a safe zone or your name is God it will allow me to do whatever the code says. This worked for magics. I can mage people out of wildy but not attack them with a whip or something. I tried editing my case 73 again:

[code] case 73: //Attack (Wilderness)

		if (PkingDelay <= 1) {
			AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
			client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
			client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
		if (plz.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("God")) {
			IsAttacking = true;
			inCombat();
		return;
			}

		if (!nonWild() && !plz.nonWild() && plz != null || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("God")) {
			IsAttacking = true;
			inCombat();
			plz.inCombat();
		if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) {
			setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
		} else {
		}
		if (server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) {
			if (server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY)
				viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY);
				faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn;
				faceNPCupdate = true;
				}
			}
		}
		break;[/code]

If you’re saying to yourself “Wtf is he doing?” well I’m trying random things because I have no idea how to get this to freaking work.

Read full topic

item.title: Owner Attacking Anywhere (Out Of Wildy) Help!

item.description:
@ringer24 wrote:

Im thinking the code that you need to edit is in the Attack() boolean, look for public boolean Attack() and find the message “This player is not in the wildy” (or whatever it says) and you probably need to edit the code around it.

item.title: Owner Attacking Anywhere (Out Of Wildy) Help!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Ok. I want to make it so the player “God” can attack anyone anywhere in my server, regardless of wildy or not. I’ve edited my nonWild() method so it says this:

[code] public boolean nonWild() {
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“God”)) {
return false;
}

    if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
	|| (absX >= 3181 && absX <= 3202 && absY >= 3381 && absY <= 3399)
	|| (absX >= 2823 && absX <= 2887 && absY >= 3751 && absY <= 3774)
	|| (absX >= 2376 && absX <= 2413 && absY >= 3476 && absY <= 3501)
	|| (absX >= 3072 && absX <= 3077 && absY >= 3865 && absY <= 3867)
	|| (absX >= 3153 && absX <= 3156 && absY >= 3922 && absY <= 3925)
	|| (absX >= 3035 && absX <= 3041 && absY >= 3705 && absY <= 3708)
	|| (absX >= 2974 && absX <= 2982 && absY >= 3761 && absY <= 3765)
	|| (absX >= 3217 && absX <= 3220 && absY >= 3217 && absY <= 3220)
	|| (absX >= 2943 && absX <= 2963 && absY >= 3813 && absY <= 3830)
	|| (absX >= 3213 && absX <= 3235 && absY >= 3391 && absY <= 3404)
	|| (absX >= 2632 && absX <= 2655 && absY >= 9887 && absY <= 9916)
	|| (absX >= 2316 && absX <= 2359 && absY >= 3157 && absY <= 3190)
	|| (absX >= 3463 && absX <= 3512 && absY >= 9480 && absY <= 9521)
	|| (absX >= 3225 && absX <= 3232 && absY >= 3433 && absY <= 3442)
	|| (absX >= 3081 && absX <= 3128 && absY >= 3912 && absY <= 3959)
	|| (absX >= 2847 && absX <= 2863 && absY >= 9628 && absY <= 9646)
	|| (absX >= 3186 && absX <= 3195 && absY >= 3957 && absY <= 3963)
	|| (absX >= 3211 && absX <= 3215 && absY >= 3424 && absY <= 3426)
	|| (absX >= 2718 && absX <= 2739 && absY >= 3361 && absY <= 3387)
            || (absX >= 2847 && absX <= 2874 && absY >= 9830 && absY <= 9854)
            || (absX >= 2401 && absX <= 2405 && absY >= 3098 && absY <= 3102)
            || (absX >= 2820 && absX <= 2876 && absY >= 2950 && absY <= 3004)
            || (absX >= 2667 && absX <= 2684 && absY >= 3717 && absY <= 3732)
            || (absX >= 3033 && absX <= 3036 && absY >= 4842 && absY <= 4844)
            || (absX >= 2687 && absX <= 2677 && absY >= 3720 && absY <= 3733)
            || (absX >= 3229 && absX <= 3242 && absY >= 9796 && absY <= 9807)
            || (absX >= 2442 && absX <= 2487 && absY >= 4808 && absY <= 4855)
            || (absX >= 2581 && absX <= 2589 && absY >= 4834 && absY <= 4842)
            || (absX >= 2712 && absX <= 2720 && absY >= 4832 && absY <= 4840)
            || (absX >= 2654 && absX <= 2662 && absY >= 4837 && absY <= 4845)
            || (absX >= 2837 && absX <= 2851 && absY >= 4826 && absY <= 4842)
            || (absX >= 2859 && absX <= 2868 && absY >= 9881 && absY <= 9883)
            || (absX >= 2880 && absX <= 2943 && absY >= 9884 && absY <= 9923)
            || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <= 3523)
            || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <= 3466)
            || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <= 3169)
            || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399)
            || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >= 3435 && absY <= 3437)
            || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >= 3431 && absY <= 3437)
            || (absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3257 && absY >= 3419 && absY <= 3423)
            || (absX >= 3250 && absX <= 3257 && absY >= 3419 && absY <= 3423)
            || (absX >= 2747 && absX <= 2758 && absY >= 2794 && absY <= 2802)
            || (absX >= 2764 && absX <= 2776 && absY >= 2793 && absY <= 2802)
            || (absX >= 2773 && absX <= 2780 && absY >= 2766 && absY <= 2770)
            || (absX >= 2751 && absX <= 2770 && absY >= 2764 && absY <= 2777)
            || (absX >= 2785 && absX <= 2809 && absY >= 2771 && absY <= 2801)
            || (absX >= 2732 && absX <= 2740 && absY >= 2789 && absY <= 2796)
            || (absX >= 2861 && absX <= 2872 && absY >= 10186
            && absY <= 10212)
            || (absX >= 2490 && absX <= 2631 && absY >= 3836 && absY <= 3904)
            || (absX >= 2883 && absX <= 2902 && absY >= 3501 && absY <= 3518)
            || (absX >= 3409 && absX <= 3452 && absY >= 3532 && absY <= 3575)
            || (absX >= 2435 && absX <= 2447 && absY >= 3080 && absY <= 3099)
            || (absX >= 3267 && absX <= 3332 && absY >= 3149 && absY <= 3270)
            || (absX >= 3151 && absX <= 3182 && absY >= 3220 && absY <= 3272)
            || (absX >= 3032 && absX <= 3063 && absY >= 3424 && absY <= 3457)
            || (absX >= 3476 && absX <= 3501 && absY >= 9483 && absY <= 9505)
            || (absX >= 2942 && absX <= 2992 && absY >= 3390 && absY <= 3414)
            || (absX >= 2420 && absX <= 2431 && absY >= 3072 && absY <= 3083)
            || (absX >= 3071 && absX <= 3122 && absY >= 3456 && absY <= 3523)
            || (absX >= 3101 && absX <= 3124 && absY >= 9825 && absY <= 9849)
            || (absX >= 2585 && absX <= 2605 && absY >= 3153 && absY <= 3169)
            || (absX >= 2853 && absX <= 2926 && absY >= 3530 && absY <= 3577)
            || (absX >= 2579 && absX <= 2622 && absY >= 3841 && absY <= 3902)
            || (absX >= 2887 && absX <= 2699 && absY >= 2939 && absY <= 2741)
            || (absX >= 2742 && absX <= 2815 && absY >= 3146 && absY <= 3235)
            || (absX >= 2692 && absX <= 2810 && absY >= 2690 && absY <= 2808)
            || (absX >= 2437 && absX <= 2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <= 3098)
            || (absX >= 2805 && absX <= 2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <= 3313)
            || (absX >= 2394 && absX <= 2398 && absY >= 3106 && absY <= 3109)
            || (absX >= 3437 && absX <= 3430 && absY >= 9772 && absY <= 9777 )
            || (absX >= 3430 && absX <= 3437 && absY >= 9772 && absY <= 9777 )
            || (absX >= 3231 && absX <= 3257 && absY >= 3507 && absY <= 3520)                
            || (absX >= 2722 && absX <= 2755 && absY >= 3455 && absY <= 3481)
            || (absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2387 && absY >= 3416 && absY <= 3447)
            || (absX >= 3544 && absX <= 3583 && absY >= 3263 && absY <= 3316)
            || (absX >= 3221 && absX <= 3244 && absY >= 9306 && absY <= 9327)
            || (absX >= 3201 && absX <= 3230 && absY >= 2774 && absY <= 2814)
            || (absX >= 2487 && absX <= 2556 && absY >= 2997 && absY <= 3051)
            || (absX >= 2856 && absX <= 2882 && absY >= 9932 && absY <= 9965)
            || (absX >= 3267 && absX <= 3286 && absY >= 2763 && absY <= 2778)
            || (absX >= 2836 && absX <= 2887 && absY >= 3558 && absY <= 3611)
            || (absX >= 3483 && absX <= 3525 && absY >= 9662 && absY <= 9702)
            || (absX >= 3236 && absX <= 3259 && absY >= 9351 && absY <= 9381)
            || (absX >= 3303 && absX <= 3308 && absY >= 9370 && absY <= 9380)
            || (absX >= 2751 && absX <= 2765 && absY >= 3492 && absY <= 3504)
            || heightLevel == 1) {

        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}[/code]

That makes it so if your name is God, the nonwild areas do not apply to you, but they do for everyone else. Here’s the problem; On my account God, it says it’s wild everywhere for me and it gives me the Attack option anywhere for me but I can’t attack anyone else because to everyone else, they’re in a safe zone so it won’t let me. How can I fix this? Obviously I’ve tried so please help me. If you need it, here is my packet 73 (Attacking in wilderness):

[code] case 73: //Attack (Wilderness)

		if (PkingDelay <= 1) {
			AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
			client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
			client AttackingOn2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];

		if (!nonWild() && !plz.nonWild() && plz != null || playerRights >= 3) {
			IsAttacking = true;
			inCombat();
			plz.inCombat();
		if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) {
			setAnimation(GetWepAnim());
		} else {
		}
		if (server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) {
			if (server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY)
				viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY);
				faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn;
				faceNPCupdate = true;
				}
			}
		}
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
